interactivity.requirements: Friday 5 Futaba Lust You must be on at least Day  86  to unlock this Event.
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Upon fulfilling all Requirements, this Event automatically occurs on the first Friday on or after Day 86.

progression.synopsis: While his class has gym class, Sensei wanders the halls of the school, trying to find Futaba , who's randomly decided to ditch the period. He ends up finding her in the nurse's office and decides to spend the period keeping her company. The conversation drifts from topic to topic, eventually landing on them discussing the sorts of dreams they have, specifically Sensei's. Inspired by one in particular, he suggests an idea to Futaba, which she reluctantly agrees to.
trivia: Since this is Futaba's first Lust Event, you can change the nickname she calls you. The list of names that result in altered interactions can be found here .

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.5.
